syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Objective
syllabus_leaves.title: Objective

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > UNICEF works for the protection of children in respect of their survival, health, and well-being.
path_titles: UNICEF works for the protection of children in respect of their survival, health, and well-being.
syllabus_leaves.title: UNICEF works for the protection of children in respect of their survival, health, and well-being.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > It provides funds for training personnel, including health and sanitation workers, teachers and nutritionists.
path_titles: It provides funds for training personnel, including health and sanitation workers, teachers and nutritionists.
syllabus_leaves.title: It provides funds for training personnel, including health and sanitation workers, teachers and nutritionists.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > It provides technical supplies, equipment and other aids, ranging from paper for textbooks, to equipment and medicines to health clinics, to pipes and pumps for bringing clean water to villages.
path_titles: It provides technical supplies, equipment and other aids, ranging from paper for textbooks, to equipment and medicines to health clinics, to pipes and pumps for bringing clean water to villages.
syllabus_leaves.title: It provides technical supplies, equipment and other aids, ranging from paper for textbooks, to equipment and medicines to health clinics, to pipes and pumps for bringing clean water to villages.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > It assists governments to plan, develop and extend community-based services in the fields of maternal and child health, nutrition, clean water and sanitation.
path_titles: It assists governments to plan, develop and extend community-based services in the fields of maternal and child health, nutrition, clean water and sanitation.
syllabus_leaves.title: It assists governments to plan, develop and extend community-based services in the fields of maternal and child health, nutrition, clean water and sanitation.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > It provides help to children and mothers in emergencies arising from natural calamities, civil strife and epidemics.
path_titles: It provides help to children and mothers in emergencies arising from natural calamities, civil strife and epidemics.
syllabus_leaves.title: It provides help to children and mothers in emergencies arising from natural calamities, civil strife and epidemics.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > It makes effort to prevent diseases like tuberculosis (T.B.), malaria, eye diseases, skin diseases, etc.
path_titles: It makes effort to prevent diseases like tuberculosis (T.B.), malaria, eye diseases, skin diseases, etc.
syllabus_leaves.title: It makes effort to prevent diseases like tuberculosis (T.B.), malaria, eye diseases, skin diseases, etc.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > Functions > UNICEF performs various other functions.
syllabus_leaves.title: UNICEF performs various other functions.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > The government of India has launched in collaboration with UNICEF - the National Mission on Immunisation, the National Mission for Drinking Water and the National Literacy Mission.
path_titles: The government of India has launched in collaboration with UNICEF - the National Mission on Immunisation, the National Mission for Drinking Water and the National Literacy Mission.
syllabus_leaves.title: The government of India has launched in collaboration with UNICEF - the National Mission on Immunisation, the National Mission for Drinking Water and the National Literacy Mission.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > Community Development Programme has been started in the rural areas of India with UNICEF's assistance, aimed at maternal and child health.
path_titles: Community Development Programme has been started in the rural areas of India with UNICEF's assistance, aimed at maternal and child health.
syllabus_leaves.title: Community Development Programme has been started in the rural areas of India with UNICEF's assistance, aimed at maternal and child health.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > The government's efforts to reduce infant and child mortality due to diarrhoeal diseases were supported by UNICEF for the production of Oral Rehydration Therapy (ORT).
path_titles: The government's efforts to reduce infant and child mortality due to diarrhoeal diseases were supported by UNICEF for the production of Oral Rehydration Therapy (ORT).
syllabus_leaves.title: The government's efforts to reduce infant and child mortality due to diarrhoeal diseases were supported by UNICEF for the production of Oral Rehydration Therapy (ORT).

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > UNICEF is a partner of the Indian government in the accelerated rural water supply programme.
path_titles: UNICEF is a partner of the Indian government in the accelerated rural water supply programme.
syllabus_leaves.title: UNICEF is a partner of the Indian government in the accelerated rural water supply programme.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > Since the 1990s, the government of India, UNICEF and other UN agencies have been working together for the promotion of iodised salt as the best way of preventing iodine deficiency disorders.
path_titles: Since the 1990s, the government of India, UNICEF and other UN agencies have been working together for the promotion of iodised salt as the best way of preventing iodine deficiency disorders.
syllabus_leaves.title: Since the 1990s, the government of India, UNICEF and other UN agencies have been working together for the promotion of iodised salt as the best way of preventing iodine deficiency disorders.

syllabus_leaves.path: UNITED NATIONS CHILDREN'S FUND (UNICEF) > UNICEF Programmes in India > UNICEF seeks to advance the fulfilment of the rights of all women and children in India to survival, development, participation and protection by reducing social inequalities based on gender, caste, ethnicity or region.
path_titles: UNICEF seeks to advance the fulfilment of the rights of all women and children in India to survival, development, participation and protection by reducing social inequalities based on gender, caste, ethnicity or region.
syllabus_leaves.title: UNICEF seeks to advance the fulfilment of the rights of all women and children in India to survival, development, participation and protection by reducing social inequalities based on gender, caste, ethnicity or region.
